titles.title: A bill to make permanent the Payments in Lieu of Taxes program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 1/13/2014--Introduced. Makes permanent the Payment in Lieu of Taxes (PILT) Program (under which counties or other eligible units of local government in which U.S.-owned entitlement land is located are entitled to certain payments under such program which may be used for any governmental purpose).
